message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have the rest. Hopefully, we can settle this quickly!
Your offer was a bit imbalanced, Alice. Let's be more realistic. How about a 60/40 split in my favor?
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give you a little more, but I think 55/45 is a fair compromise.
Alice, time is literally money at this point!  A 50/50 split is the only fair solution. Let's end this before we both lose out.
